title: >>>>SUTHERLAND RD-BRIGHTON GUT RENOVATED LARGE 1 BED STEPS TO COMM AVE
posting_body: ['AVAILABLE:', '09/01/2022', '1/2 FEE PAID BY OWNER', 'A very spacious, and completely gut-renovated 1 bedroom, 1 bath rental apartment located on Sutherland Rd in Brighton.', ' The unit is located in a professionally managed building that is located just steps to the MBTA Green Line,  Commonwealth Ave, Boston University, Harvard Ave, Brookine & Beacon St, and Boston College!', ' Heat and hot water are included in the rent price, and there is shared laundry in the building and a private deck included with the unit.', 'Please email Ben with any questions or to schedule a viewing of the property!', 'BenC @', 'Benjaminapartments .', 'com', 'Transportation', 'Tram: B Sutherland Road (0.11 mi)', 'Bus: 86 Chestnut Hill Ave @ Englewood Ave (0.30 mi)', 'Bus: 501 Winship St @ Union St (0.47 mi)', 'Bus: Green Line D Shuttle Reservoir (0.36 mi)', 'Tram: C Englewood Avenue (0.25 mi)', 'Tram: D Reservoir (0.37 mi)', 'Bus: 65 Washington St @ Commonwealth Ave (0.35 mi)']
